let py = rr.match(/[a-zÃ¼]+/g);
let fd = rr.match(/[a-zÃ¼]+|[^a-zÃ¼]+/g);

//console.log('ğŸŒˆrr:' + rr + 'ğŸŒˆpy:' + py + 'ğŸŒˆfd:' + fd)
//ç»Ÿè®¡å¤±è´¥æ¬¡æ•°
let nm = 0;
//å­˜æ”¾å¤±è´¥æ‹¼éŸ³
let mm = [];

for (let i = 0; i < py.length; i++) {
    let pyd = py[i];
    let wz = fd.indexOf(pyd);
    let fdqq = fd[wz - 1];
    let fdqq_d = fdqq.substr(-1,1);
    let fdhh = fd[wz + 1];
    let fdhh_d = fdhh.substr(0,1);
    delete fd[wz];
    let zkqq = pyd + '_q';
    let zkhh = pyd + '_h';
    //åˆ¤æ–­éæ­£å¸¸æ‹¼éŸ³
    const nopy = sz1.includes(pyd);
    if (!nopy) {
        zk1[pyd] ? j1 = zk1[zkqq].includes(fdqq_d) || zk1[zkhh].includes(fdhh_d) : j1 = false;
        zk2[pyd] ? j2 = zk2[zkqq].includes(fdqq_d) || zk2[zkhh].includes(fdhh_d) : j2 = false;
        zk3[pyd] ? j3 = zk3[zkqq].includes(fdqq_d) || zk3[zkhh].includes(fdhh_d) : j3 = false;
        zk4[pyd] ? j4 = zk4[zkqq].includes(fdqq_d) || zk4[zkhh].includes(fdhh_d) : j4 = false;
        zk5[pyd] ? j5 = true : j5 = false;
        zk6[pyd] ? j6 = true : j6 = false;
        zk0[pyd] ? j0 = zk0[zkqq].includes(fdqq_d) || zk0[zkhh].includes(fdhh_d) : j0 = false;
        j1 = j1 || (zk1[pyd] ?  zk1[zkqq].includes(fdqq) || zk1[zkhh].includes(fdhh) : false);
        j2 = j2 || (zk2[pyd] ?  zk2[zkqq].includes(fdqq) || zk2[zkhh].includes(fdhh) : false);
        j3 = j3 || (zk3[pyd] ?  zk3[zkqq].includes(fdqq) || zk3[zkhh].includes(fdhh) : false);
        j0 = j0 || (zk0[pyd] ?  zk0[zkqq].includes(fdqq) || zk0[zkhh].includes(fdhh) : false);
        if (j1) {
            rr = rr.replace(pyd, zk1[pyd]);
        } else if (j2) {
            rr = rr.replace(pyd, zk2[pyd]);
        } else if (j3) {
            rr = rr.replace(pyd, zk3[pyd]);
        } else if (j4) {
            rr = rr.replace(pyd, zk4[pyd]);
        } else if (j5) {
            rr = rr.replace(pyd, zk5[pyd]);
        } else if (j6) {
            rr = rr.replace(pyd, zk6[pyd]);
        } else if (j0) {
            rr = rr.replace(pyd, zk0[pyd]);
        } else {
//é”™è¯¯æ‹¼éŸ³ä¿å­˜ï¼Œé˜²äºŒæ¬¡åŒ¹é…
            mm.push(pyd);
if (ts) {
xyx = (zk1[pyd]||'â™¤')+'ğŸ’”' + nm + 'ğŸ“Œ'+(zk2[pyd]||'â™¤');
} else {
xyx = 'ğŸ’”' + nm + 'ğŸ“Œ';
}
            rr = rr.replace(pyd, xyx);
            nm++;
        }
    }  else {
        //éæ‹¼éŸ³è¿˜åŸå¤§å°å†™
        let zz = new RegExp(pyd, 'i');
        let hy = result.match(zz);
        result = result.replace(hy,'');
        rr = rr.replace(pyd, hy);
    }
}

nm = 0;
for (char of mm) {
//é”™è¯¯æ‹¼éŸ³è¿˜åŸå¤§å°å†™
let zz = new RegExp(char, 'i');
let hy = result.match(zz);
result = result.replace(hy,'');

if (ts) {
rr = rr.replace('ğŸ’”'+nm+'ğŸ“Œ', 'ğŸ’”'+hy+'ğŸ“Œ');
} else {
rr = rr.replace('ğŸ’”'+nm+'ğŸ“Œ', hy);
}

nm++;
}
